def_cn: 打开（伞等）；展开（帆、旗帜等）
def_en: If you unfurl something rolled or folded such as an umbrella, sail, or flag, you open it, so that it is spread out. You can also say that it unfurls .

def_cn: （事件、故事或场面）展开，显露
def_en: If you say that events, stories, or scenes unfurl before you, you mean that you are aware of them or can see them as they happen or develop.
